com.pump.plaf

Class DecoratedTreeUI.BasicTreeDecoration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.plaf.DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
      • com.pump.plaf.DecoratedTreeUI.BasicTreeDecoration
  • Enclosing class:
    DecoratedTreeUI

    public static class DecoratedTreeUI.BasicTreeDecoration
extends DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
    This is a simple 3-state TreeDecoration that stores a fixed "normal", "rollover" and "pressed" icon state.

    The default implementation of isVisible(..) will only render this decoration when a tree node is selected. This is just an aesthetic choice you are free to override. (The original motivation for this decision was: too many decorations might become visual clutter.)

    It is assumed that if a rollover or pressed icon is provided that it will be the same size as the normal icon.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors

      • BasicTreeDecoration

        public BasicTreeDecoration(javax.swing.Icon normalIcon,
                           javax.swing.Icon rolloverIcon,
                           javax.swing.Icon pressedIcon,
                           java.awt.event.ActionListener actionListener)
        Create a clickable decoration with 3 states and an ActionListener.
        Parameters:
        normalIcon - the default icon. This may not be null.
        rolloverIcon - an optional icon to display when the mouse hovers over this decoration.
        pressedIcon - an optional icon to display when the mouse clicks this decoration.
        actionListener - an optional ActionListener to receive events when this decoration is clicked.

      • getIcon

        public javax.swing.Icon getIcon(javax.swing.JTree tree,

                                boolean expanded,
                                boolean leaf,
                                int row,
                                boolean isRollover,
                                boolean isPressed)
        Description copied from class: DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Returns the icon this decoration should currently render.

        It is assumed this icon will not change dimensions.

        Specified by:
        getIcon in class DecoratedTreeUI.TreeDecoration
        Parameters:
        tree - the tree being rendered
        value - the tree node being rendered
        selected - whether the tree node is selected
        expanded - whether the tree node is expanded
        leaf - whether the tree node is a leaf node
        row - the row index of the tree node
        isRollover - whether the mouse is hovering over this decoration
        isPressed - whether the mouse is pressed to arm this icon, similar to how buttons are armed.
        Returns:
        the icon this decoration should currently render.
